bibl.bibl: Reeve, Lovell Augustus and Walford, Edward, eds. 1863–7. Portraits of men of eminence in literature, science, and art, with biographical memoirs. 6 vols. London: Lovell Reeve and Alfred Wm. Bennett.
bibl.idno: BL Catalogue; UL has vols. 1–4 only, WB2 Ii.4.34–5. Walford takes over in 1865 but name doesn’t appear on early vols.; on Walford’s involvement, see Walford 1868 and Browne 1998, pp. 269–71.
